subject: MY NAME IS ANDREW J SAVAGE
body:
MY NAME IS ANDREW J SAVAGE
DIPLOMATIC AGENT FROM (IMF)
this message is coming to you to inform you that the state government
of International Monitoring Fund (IMF) have compensated you  with the
sum of  ($8.5 million)   Eight  million, five hundred thousand USD) as
a compensation fund for scam victims and also saying sorry for
whatever you lost in the hands of the scam victims, and also promise
you that such will not repeat it again from today the government of
United Nation have been in control  To Make sure you are happy this
christmas holyday as we are compensating all the victim this season W
have directed you to contact Mr Andrew J Savage your delivery Agent
for you to get your own package ,You are free choose How you wanted to
receive your funds
Contact Inf +1 (814)499- 2141
so 
kindly confirm your address were to ship this compensation fund to you.
Full name
Phone number
Occupation
Copy of your ID card
Thanks as we are we are waiting for your positive responds

subject: Re: MY NAME IS ANDREW J SAVAGE
body:
Hello Andrew Savage,

Wow, this is such an unexpected surprise! I can't believe the state government of Monitoring Fund IMF has chosen me for this. It's really kind of them to think about scam victims like this. 

I'm curious though, how did you guys select me? And could you tell me more about how this fund works? I'm just so excited and want to understand everything clearly.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Robert

subject: Re: MY NAME IS ANDREW J SAVAGE
body:
Your name and your email address was mentioned to the United States Secret
Service by one of the victims

Meanwhile this Compensation department has been mandated by the IMF and the
United Nations to deliver your compensation funds to you through UPS
Courier Service which is 100% Or ATM card Guarantee for payment to you as
one of the scammed victim.
